ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Something Awful.com pokes fun at EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: I have to agree with those people who hate beggers.  I was one when I first started out a long timne ago about six months after thae game started.  Now I help
ygData.messageBody:
I have to agree with those people who hate beggers.  I was one when I first started out a long timne ago about six months after thae game started.  Now I help all those I can who do not beg.  I had a gentleman igve my level 1 wizard a full suit of cloth armor a decent weapon and an offer to join a giuld a level 5 and I didn't even ask him for anything all he did was ask what class I was and he gave me the items.  I was shocked and very grateful.  I remember one time I gave a low level caster amost a full suit of armor I no longer needed and then about 2 minutes later after giving a newbie a rusty axe i saw a shout that they were looking for new items and weapons I was upset  but all beggers should be taken out and given to the ogres for food.
                                                        Justin
